document_data.name: Sailors of the Heavenly Seas
document_data.orgname: the Sailors of the Heavenly Seas
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sailors of the Heavenly Seas''' was a sect of followers of [[Valkur]], the Captain of the Waves.
document_data.Description: Originally from [[Faer√ªn]], the Saiors of the Heavenly Seas decided to depart [[Toril]] in favor of exploring the endlessness of [[Realmspace]] aboard [[spelljammer]] ships. They viewed Valkur as more of a [[god]] of exploration versus a god of the oceans.
